detail.description:
Welcome to Robinsons Bank's new mobile app, RBank Digital.

Experience ease in Banking! Your banking needs are now within reach!

With this new mobile application, you will have the power to do all your banking needs 24/7 and within your reach. With our app, you can do the following at your convenience:

* Monitor your finances - Track your finances by accessing your account history and transactions anytime and anywhere.
* Transfer Funds Online - RBank Direct2Bank allows you to transfer funds from your Robinsons Bank account to other domsetic bank accounts in the Philippines.
* Hassle-Free Bills Payment - Eliminate the hassle of lining to pay your bills! Use your Personal Online Banking to pay bills quickly and easily.
* Use of Branch or ATM Locator - Use your Personal Online Banking to find the nearest Robinsons Bank Branch and ATM locations near you.
* Secured Account - Your Personal Online Banking generates a One-Time Password that provides extra layer of security.
* Report Lost Card - Your Personal Online Banking helps you to instantly block your stolen or lost Robinsons Bank Visa Debit Card.
* QuickR way to Pay - Enjoy the QuickR Way to Pay when you transfer funds or pay participating merchants via QR code.


        more
